messages.dropConfirmation: Throw out this biscuit again to confirm!
messages.newVersion: A new flavor, %newestVersion% has been baked. Eat it by clicking here.
messages.discord: Want to taste the biscuits cough cough I mean the changelog? Click here to look in the oven aka join my discord (pls i have a minecraft family to feed).
messages.developmentVersion: You are tasting a beta biscuit: %version%. The actual most recent biscuit is %newestVersion%
messages.labymod: Labymod Users: A few biscuits here and there don't work.
messages.minionCannotReach: A %type% oven cannot bake and has stopped producing biscuits!
messages.cancelledStemBreak: The biscuit gods have stopped you from eating this biscuit. Use your hands if you'd like to eat it.
